title: An Act relative to custom-built heavy duty vehicles sold in the Commonwealth

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Moore, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 266) of Michael O. Moore for legislation relative to custom-built heavy duty vehicles sold in the Commonwealth.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-11:30 AM in A-2                                                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on Senate Ways and Means
committee on Senate Ways and Means
